title: Nasus buff thats incoming (7.15 ???)
body:
I really like the idear of that Ult Q buff it will make nasus that ultimate raid boss he ones was and make people play nasus :3
But one thing that I just realised he will get focused like crazy early on wouldn't he?
I was also wondering when is it coming out?

replies.body: That kind of buff could definitely make people want to put a little more pressure on him throughout the game! I can't say for sure how it'll pan out, since PBE changes can always be tweaked or reverted before they go live. You should reach out to the [**Gameplay **](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)board to get more feedback on how the community feels though!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=A6YFtpEW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-17T01:37:40.417+0000)
>
> That kind of buff could definitely make people want to put a little more pressure on him throughout the game! I can't say for sure how it'll pan out, since PBE changes can always be tweaked or reverted before they go live. You should reach out to the [**Gameplay **](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)board to get more feedback on how the community feels though!

Its actually an overall nerf :/ 
Pros of Nasus have talked about how Q-stack Nasus just isnt viable, primarily because his early game is far too weak.

Quas figured out that maxing Spirit Fire and using its flat armor reduction actually allows Nasus to have an early, mid, and decent lategame by applying tons of pressure and being able to trade evenly, even if it sacrifises Q-stack nasus's ridicolous lategame power (he usually finishes games with aronud 200 stacks). 

Quas had 3 positions in top Challenger, whilist playing Nasus. Possbly the only Nasus player who has made him work in high elos. 

By making Spirit Fire's Armor reduction % and not Flat you are removing the whole point of this path, and the only viable high elo build, since you are not fixing his atrocious and exploitable early game.

Its a massive Buff for Low elo nasus, and a crippling Nerf for high elo nasus....

Quasus style dies with the ZZ'Rot nerf and then with the Doran's Ring passive no longer stacking. 3 early points in E then going Q is the most efficient style now, if you area against a ranged hard counter, otherwise you become irrelevant after 20 minutes. Let's also not forget that E-Max essentially nullified your life steal passive as well.

This is a buff to the intended style of play for Nasus which is stacking his Q and making sure that damage is relevant against the tanks and other juggernauts he typically faces now a days.
I hope they will finally fix him, instead :)
